alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 5:09AM PST until December 23 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 3000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches expected around 3000 feet, and 6 to 9 inches of snow around 4000 feet and above today. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions visit https://www.tripcheck.com or https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map or by calling 5 1 1
